reviewText: Glad I found this series. Waited a while for the price to drop. Quality viewing; I am surprised it did not catch on in the US.

I ran across this show on late night cable channels and quite frankly fell in love with it.  Only a quick search and moments later this set was ordered and on its way.  My purchase arrived in the time specified and well packed to assure no damage was received in transit.  Very happy with my purchase and the DVDs still get plenty of use after a couple of years of ownership.  I would recommend the seller and would purchase again.

There's no need to review the content of these DVDs, as anyone who's ever watched an episode of Corner Gas is aware of this show's awesomeness.

Season 1: 13 episodes; 1.33:1 Full Frame; English Dolby Digital 5.1 & 2.0; No subtitles.
Season 2: 18 episodes; 1.33:1 Full Frame; English DD 5.1 & 2.0; No subtitles.
Season 3: 19 episodes; 1.78:1 Non-anamorphic Widescreen; English DD 5.1 & 2.0; No subtitles.
Season 4: 19 episodes; 1.78:1 Anamorphic Widescreen; English DD 5.1 & 2.0; No subtitles.
Season 5: 19 episodes; 1.78:1 Anamorphic Widescreen; English DD 5.1 & 2.0; No subtitles.

All 5 seasons are Region Free, so these DVDs can be enjoyed by Corner Gas fans all over the world (provided your equipment can handle NTSC).

Downside: Season 6 is not included.

Very funny, quirky little ensemble show.  Personality driven and not just the usual sit-com drivel.  Memorable characters set in a small town on the prairie in Canada.

This merchant shipped promptly and everything was as promised.  Good experience.

I received acknowledgement of my order with a proposed shipping date. The date that my product was shipped, I received a second e-mail that let me know that my product was on its way. The product arrived in good shape and all items were in factory sealed packages. I was very pleased with both the product and the customer service that I received in regard to this purchase.
Love the show.  My husband is actually from the area which this show is shot.  We've got pictures of the Corner Gas set and the Dog River elevator.

Corner Gas is a TV classic in the truest sense, all without a laugh track, where you'll find yourself laughing aloud. Virtually every episode is a gem and, like Laurel & Hardy comedies, you'll laugh everytime you view a show. I suggested the series to writer Burt Prelutsky, who responded: "I'm hooked, as are all my friends, and my lawyers will be contacting you!" Enough said, it's simply one of the best TV series ever produced where the writing, superb cast and excellent production values have made it a true classic.

Corner Gas 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 (5 pack) Once you watch this Canadian off-beat sitcom and get to know its cast of characters, you will want the DVDs so you can watch them again and again. Each time you watch they are just as funny as the first time (if not more so -- as you may catch some of the best one-liners you missed the first time around). My husband and I think of this series as Canada's "Seinfeld." It's also one of the few TV series that EVERYONE can watch and enjoy together.
This Canadian TV show is great. Buy it today and watch it over and over again. Funny and goofy too.

watching late  night tv. i accidently stumbled upon this show. i had to buy the 1- 5 season set. its very funny. one of the best shows ive seen in years. i highly reccomend this show if you like sarcastic humor. this show is for you. this show comes from canada.the writing is great.i spent my day off watching the first season. give this show a chance you'll be glad you did.
